About us


About Crypto for fun


Crypto for fun is a project born in February 2019 as a coursework for Web Technologies (set08101) at the Napier University of Edinburgh.

The project consisted originally in the development of a web site which could offer several different classical ciphers to its users written in JavaScript and presented as an HTML page styled with CSS.
